00029       function                main_setup()
00030       {
00033             $Settings = get_package( 'settings::settings' , 'last::last' , __FILE__ );
00034             $Settings->load_file( './cf_settings' );
00035             
00036             $Settings->define( 
00037                   'HTTP_HOST' , rtrim( 'http://'.$_SERVER[ 'SERVER_NAME' ].dirname( $_SERVER[ 'REQUEST_URI' ].'a' ) , '/\\' )
00038             );
00039             $Settings->define( 'SERVER_NAME' , $_SERVER[ 'SERVER_NAME' ] );
00040             $Settings->set_setting( 'GZIP_TRAFFIC' , $Settings->get_setting( 'GZIP_TRAFFIC' , 'true' ) == 'true' );
00041             $Settings->define( 'GZIP_TRAFFIC' );
00042       }
00043       
00054       function                index_main()
00055       {
00056             global            $StartGenerationTime;
00057             $StartGenerationTime = microtime( true );
00058       
00059             main_setup();
00060             
00061             $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00062             
00063             if( isset( $_GET[ 'page_name' ] ) === false )
00064             {
00065                   $_GET[ 'page_name' ] = 'index';
00066             }
00067             
00068             print( $PageComposer->get_page( $_GET[ 'page_name' ] ) );
00069       }

00081       function                cron_main()
00082       {
00083             main_setup();
00084 
00085             $Schedule = get_package( 'schedule' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00086             
00087             $Schedule->process_tasks();
00088       }

00112       function                common_error_message_processing( $Visualisation , $e )
00113       {
00114             $ErrorTemplate = file_get_contents( './res/templates/exception.tpl' );
00115             $ErrorTemplate = str_replace( '{exception_message}' , $e->getMessage() , $ErrorTemplate );
00116             
00117             if( $Visualisation )
00118             {
00119                   print( 
00120                         str_replace( 
00121                               '{download}' , '&nbsp;<a href="./log/exception.last.zip">download</a>' , $ErrorTemplate 
00122                         ) 
00123                   );
00124             }
00125             
00126             return( $ErrorTemplate );
00127       }
00128       
00147       function                process_script_error( $Visualisation , $e )
00148       {
00149             global      $DEBUG;
00150             
00151             if( $DEBUG )
00152             {
00153                   $ErrorTemplate = common_error_message_processing( $Visualisation , $e );
00154                   
00155                   $Handle = fopen( './log/exception.log' , 'at' );
00156                   fwrite( $Handle , $e->getMessage().'<hr width="90%">' );
00157                   fclose( $Handle );
00158                   
00159                   $Handle = fopen( './log/exception.last.html' , 'wt' );
00160                   fwrite( $Handle , str_replace( '{download}' , '' , $ErrorTemplate ) );
00161                   fclose( $Handle );
00162                   
00163                   @unlink( './log/exception.last.zip' );
00164                   $zip = new ZipArchive();
00165                   $zip->open( './log/exception.last.zip' , ZIPARCHIVE::CREATE );
00166                   $zip->addFromString( 'exception.html' , str_replace( '{download}' , '' , $ErrorTemplate ) );
00167             }
00168       }
